channel.title: What srl? is it a new scar?
channel.description:
what srl?? is it a new scar?
and does scar still work? it dodt seems to be working for me. id also like a tut on how to use since theres no srl tut board.

item.title: What srl? is it a new scar?
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Bebemycat2, post:5, topic:63328”]SRL is an include for SCAR.

Basically an include is a library of extra functions made by the SRL developers and the SRL community that SCAR doesn’t have.[/quote]

look at one of the tuts, or watch this video (not made by me) http://rs67.rapidshare.com/files/12280988/Setting_up_SRL_2.avi

Read full topic
item.source: What srl? is it a new scar?

SRL is an include for SCAR.

Basically an include is a library of extra functions made by the SRL developers and the SRL community that SCAR doesn’t have.
